welcome: Welcome to my interactive terminal portfolio! Type 'help' to see available commands.
motd: Tip: Use up/down arrows to navigate command history and Tab for completion.
about: Hi, I'm a senior Software Engineer and DevOps Engineer with over four years of experience specializing in Laravel-based applications. Proven expertise in developing and managing Student Management Systems for universities and high schools, as well as creating an Inventory Management System. Strong background in DevOps, Docker, and Linux environments. Passionate about open-source contributions and optimizing software deployment processes.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description:
A student management system for Harambee University. Built with Laravel.
Included features like student registration, course enrollment, and grade management.

projects.title: School Management System
projects.description:
A school management system for Kamara School. Built with Laravel and Livewire.
Included features like student registration, course enrollment, and grade management.

projects.title: Music Streaming App
projects.description:
A music streaming app built with Express.js.
Contributed as a DevOps Engineer.

projects.title: Ethiojobs
projects.description:
A job portal built with Laravel.
Contributed as a DevOps Engineer and Backend Developer.

projects.title: Terminal Portfolio
projects.description:
A terminal-based portfolio built with Rust and Yew.
It is open-source and available on my GitHub.

projects.title: GitHub Commit Notifier
projects.description:
A terminal-based GitHub commit notifier built with Rust.
It is open-source and available on my GitHub.

projects.title: Yazi Flavors
projects.description:
A Theme for Yazi terminal file manager.
It have a dark and light tokyonight themes.
It is open-source and available on my GitHub.

work_experience.description: - Managed and maintained Oromia Transport Autority Database

work_experience.role: Senior Software Engineer and DevOps Engineer
work_experience.description:
- Developed and maintained Laravel-based applications, including student and inventory management systems.
- Led the development of a Student Management System for Harambee University and Kamara School.
- Optimized CI/CD pipelines, managed Dockerized environments, and ensured efficient DevOps workflows.
- Played a key role in a music streaming app as a DevOps Engineer, streamlining deployment and infrastructure.

- Developed and maintained Laravel-based applications, including ethiojobs.
- Managed Dockerized environments, optimized CI/CD pipelines, and ensured efficient DevOps workflows.
- Played a key role in a music streaming app as a DevOps Engineer, streamlining deployment and infrastructure.
